org.fiware.cybercaptor.server.informationsystem.graph

Class InformationSystemGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fiware.cybercaptor.server.informationsystem.graph.InformationSystemGraph

  • public class InformationSystemGraph
extends Object
    Class used to represent the information system graph (topological view of attack graph)
    Author:
    Francois-Xavier Aguessy
